title: Company Settings
description: Configure attendance, payroll and company policies

attendance.roundingTooltip: Round attendance time according to configured interval and direction
attendance.lateGraceTooltip: Minutes allowed to be late without being marked as late
attendance.earlyLeaveGraceTooltip: Minutes allowed to leave early without being marked as early leave
attendance.checkInMethodDesc: Choose how employees are allowed to check in
attendance.allowMobileCheckInDesc: Employees can check in using the mobile app
attendance.allowWebCheckInDesc: Employees can check in via web browser on desktop
attendance.geoLocationTooltip: Employees must enable GPS when checking in. The system will verify if the employee is within the allowed radius of an attendance location
attendance.geoFenceRadiusMetersDesc: Default radius when no specific attendance locations are configured. If locations are added below, each location uses its own radius

payroll.payDayTooltip: Day of month when salary is paid
payroll.cutoffDayTooltip: Day of month when attendance is finalized for payroll

overtime.useLegalMinimumTooltip: Automatically apply minimum overtime rates according to local regulations

locations.title: Attendance Locations
locations.name: Location Name
locations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this location?
locations.nameHint: Use a recognizable name, e.g., Main Office, Branch A
locations.addressHint: Full address to help employees identify the location
locations.coordinatesStep2: Search for the company address or navigate to the desired location
locations.coordinatesStep3: Right-click on the exact location on the map
locations.coordinatesStep4: Click the coordinates shown (e.g., 21.0285, 105.8542) to copy
locations.coordinatesStep5: Paste the first number into Latitude, the second into Longitude
locations.latitudeHint: First number from Google Maps coordinates. E.g., 35.6762 (Tokyo), 21.0285 (Hanoi)
locations.longitudeHint: Second number from Google Maps coordinates. E.g., 139.6503 (Tokyo), 105.8542 (Hanoi)
locations.radiusHint: Maximum distance from the center point where employees can check in. E.g., 100m for small offices, 200-500m for industrial zones
locations.isActiveHint: Turn off to temporarily disable this location without deleting it

explanations.attendanceDesc: Set up default working hours, time rounding rules, and check-in options for employees.
explanations.attendanceTip1: Configure late/early leave grace periods to avoid unnecessary penalties
explanations.attendanceTip2: Enable GPS requirement if you need to control check-in locations
explanations.payrollDesc: Set up default salary type, pay day, cutoff day, and payroll calculation rules.
explanations.payrollTip1: Cutoff day should be at least 5 days before pay day for processing time
explanations.payrollTip2: Standard working days affect daily/hourly salary calculations
explanations.overtimeDesc: Set up overtime multipliers, night shift hours, and overtime limits according to regulations.
explanations.overtimeTip1: Enable 'Use Legal Minimum Rates' to ensure compliance with regulations
explanations.overtimeTip2: Overtime limits help protect employee health and control costs
explanations.allowanceDeductionDesc: Set up allowance and deduction templates to use when configuring employee salaries.
explanations.allowanceDeductionTip1: Codes will be auto-generated when saved. Just enter the template name.
